recipe.title: Lemon Chicken And Asparagus Stir-Fry (Under 500 Calories) Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Season the chicken with the salt and pepper and fry with the olive oil. After a few minutes, add the garlic.
Fry the chicken with the garlic for another few minutes, then add the asparagus, lemon zest, and lemon juice.
Stir again, before mixing in the soy sauce.
Serve with rice and sprinkle with lemon zest on top.
